Creates CallEdge from call file (i.e. trigger-builds)

Reads file by given name and returns CallEdge array

get_calls_from_dict(file_dict, from_name, settings={})¶

Processes unfolded yaml object to CallEdge array

settings is a dict of settings for keeping information like in what section we are right now (e.g. builders, publishers)

jabba.synonym_parser module¶

class jabba.synonym_parser.SynonymSet¶

A set of synonyms set If two parameters are in the same set, they are considered synonyms

add_set(s)¶
are_synonyms(param_1, param_2)¶

Parse an array of string from argparser to SynonymSet

jabba.synonym_parser.parse_from_array(arr)¶

Parse 2d array into synonym set Every array inside arr is considered a set of synonyms

Utility class for managing file index, dependency extractor, call and include graphs
